thread.title: She can’t EVEN! Unhinged Ashley Judd looking for ‘political safe spaces’ free of Trump supporters
thread.title_full: She can’t EVEN! Unhinged Ashley Judd looking for ‘political safe spaces’ free of Trump supporters

author: Sam J.
title: She can’t EVEN! Unhinged Ashley Judd looking for ‘political safe spaces’ free of Trump supporters
text:
QUICK, TO THE SAFE SPACE! 
She even said the guy probably was part of the KKK. Trending 'Ugly elitism': Josh Barro SLAMMED for calling McDonald's/Trump demographic 'fat slobs with bad taste' 
Right? smh . @DLoesch : “…what [ @AshleyJudd ’s] actually calling for is only a political space in which everyone shares her exact belief system” #First100 pic.twitter.com/bhBz7YZexg 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) March 15, 2017 
Maybe she just needs to wear a safety pin? 
Via Fox News Insider : 
She wrote that the man, “with open hostility,” turned to walk away and said to her “we like Trump.” 
Judd said the man’s response was part of his silent plan to treat her with “rudeness, aggression and disrespect.” 
“Who knows, maybe he’s already done something undignified with the picture or maybe it was just a pretense so he could say something menacing to me,” Judd wrote. 
She continued, writing about the possible responses she wanted to use, like accusing the man of “voting with the KKK” and “dragged his charming town into it” by claiming the old iron-ore hub near the Kentucky state line is full of “misogynists.” 
Judd said college basketball should be a “no politics here” zone. 
Or maybe she should just watch basketball from her home if she can’t deal with reality like an adult? @FoxNewsInsider @realDonaldTrump So working man tells a movie star that he supports the man who is for the working man. Poor gal… 
The nerve!
